description: This table contains the Forms (LQF) record IDs of the background images for the mammography drawing tools.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: BKGRND_IMG_FORM_ID
columns.description: This column stores the LQF record IDs of the background images for the mammo drawing tools.

columns.name: BKGRND_IMG_FORM_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.
